attributes.action: We need Nigel Farage MEP to be declared  as Lord Protector of Britain
attributes.additional_details: Over the years we have seen the Magna Carta Libertatum to be disregarded by traitors in various government administrations. There is now a firm need to ensure sovereignty is completely returned to Great Britain. The public are not sure that traitors still don't exist in the present administration. So there is a need for a Lord Protector to ensure that our all our sovereignty rights are returned to Westminster forthwith and with out political objection.
attributes.background: The Lord Protector would work for the crown and the citizens of Great Britain. The job would entail in declaring, all treaties with the European Union void. That issues be dealt only in British courts.
